text:
This may be the same as bug report 30769 but I am not sure.  I have Windows XP 
home edition with apache 2.0.49.  It has been very stable since I installed it 
a month or so ago.  When I installed the update called service pack 2, apache 
stopped working.  There was nothing in the log.  An interesting fact is that it 
worked when I connected to it from that same machine (http://localhost).
creator: jim.shain@hitchcock.org

text:
I probably should have added that when I uninstalled the Service Pack, apache 
started working again.

Jim
creator: jim.shain@hitchcock.org

text: did you trying disabling the built in Firewall included in Windows XP SP2?
creator: chip@force-elite.com
